text: [Music]
once upon a time if the great nation of
France there was a small town called
pluie a neck on the further side of blue
a neck there were two rows of huge
stones the stones were so tall and heavy
it is believed that only all the fairies
in the world could have placed them
upright not far off from the great stone
Avenue and on the banks of the Little
River Intel there lived a man named
marcin and his sister rasa neck rasa
neck was a very pretty girl and was
treated like a princess by her brother
marcin who was very protective of her he
would turn down all the proposals that
would come his way asking for her
sister's hand in marriage no thank you
my pretty little sister would one day
get married to a prince not some silly
apple trader well Mars II wasn't aware
of the fact that rasa neck and her
childhood friend Bernays were in love
how I hope I was a prince so that I
could ask your hand in marriage from
your brother but alas I am a merely poor
woodcutter well why don't you tell my
brother about us at the feast tomorrow
but no buts either you tell him or I
will do it myself I don't care about the
riches I care about you and that's all
um but do you tomorrow
ie the next day there was a grand feast
at Mars een and Ra's Nick's house to
celebrate the beginning of the harvest
season their house was filled with
guests
Bernays was also present Rasen ik while
talking to one of the guests gestured
Bernays to go speak with her brother
but hesitantly he walked up to Marcin so
mozz een I was saying that a beggar in
my house I am NOT a beggar it's me
burnell's I am NOT talking about you
Mars Ewok towei and towards the door
were a man dressed in ragged clothes
stood everyone in the room was staring
at him who are you my name is Dario I am
a witch and I have been travelling
around the world for years I was very
tired and hungry when I saw your house
please give me some food to eat and a
shelter to rest tonight I will be
forever grateful to you Marcin thought
for a while and then said okay I will
give you food and shelter for tonight
but in return I want you to use your
witchery and find my sister a suitable
Prince for marriage I will do my best
soon the food was laid on the table and
all the guests ate to their heart's
content
Bernays did not get another chance to
speak with mars een which left rosin act
very disappointed that night when all
the guests had left Dario was given the
stable to retire inside the stable there
was a donkey in this sheep
all right friends good night
Dario lie down and closed his eyes
outside the full moon Shawn brightly and
a shooting star sped across the sky at
the very moment the donkey shook his
head and smiled with the light hey huh
it's finally that time of the year Bob
we can talk come on come on tell me what
is up I don't feel like talking in
presence of a witch he's a witch yes he
is a witch I heard him when he was
introducing himself to Mar Zayn but let
me tell you he is not a very good wench
and how do you know that
well witches are clever this one here
isn't even clever enough to have found
out what a piece of luck might befall
him tomorrow oh wow don't you know once
every hundred years the stones on Ploen
that go down to drink at the river and
while they are away the treasures
underneath them are uncovered remember
but the stones return so quickly to
their places that you certainly would be
caught and punished by them unless you
have in your hand
a purple Apple yes but that is not
enough even supposing you get safely by
the treasure will have to be picked and
brought out by a person who was never
sinned otherwise he will crumble into
dust
the donkey was about to say something
when that only found himself unable to
speak please the donkey turned towards
the window and saw a shooting star speed
across the sky from the other direction
implying the time that they were allowed
to speak was over he closed his eyes and
so did the sheep but the evil Dario had
heard everything
[Music]
you fools now I will become the richest
man in the whole of France and Mary
rosin ahead so the next morning
Dario sat out looking for the purple
apple he went to the market to the
jungle and to the meadows but nowhere
could he find the purple Apple finally
when he had almost given up he stopped
under a tree suddenly something dropped
on his head ouch he looked down and saw
it was an apple and not just any Apple
but a purple one
oh the angels have blessed me now I will
become the richest man you know all the
friends with the apple in his hand
Dario reached the stone Avenue where the
tall stone stood as he was passing the
long line of stones he saw Bernays
working with a chisel on the tallest of
them what are you doing there Oh mr.
Dario hello I happened to have no work
to do today so I thought I would just
carve a heart on this stone hey I
believe you think it will help you to in
roz neck Bernays ceased his task for a
moment to look at him so you know about
that unluckily my zine wants a
brother-in-law who has more pounds than
I have pants and suppose I were to give
you more pounds than my zena's ever
dreamed of you yes I and what am I to do
to gain the money let me tell you that
if it is a deed that is wrong
and I will not do it I am a man of
virtue
this made Dario smile he had heard from
the people of poetic about Bernays and
how he lives by morals and virtues but
now he was sure that he was the right
man for the job what I wanted you only
needs a little courage
if that is all tell me what I have to do
and I will do it
Dario walked towards Bernays and
whispered the plan in his ears later
that night as the hour struck from the
great church at Ploen Eck Furnas entered
the wood he found Dario already there
with a bag in each hand and one on the
ground you upon Shore tell me what are
you going to do with all the riches
first I will ask for Roz Nick's hand in
marriage and with the remaining that I
will have I will give it to all the poor
and needy people of blow a neck oh hell
let's get to work then
with the first stroke of 12:00 a great
noise arose over the silent heat and the
earth seemed to rock under the feet of
the two Watchers the next moment by the
light of the moon they beheld the huge
stones near them leave their places and
go down the slope leading to the river
it seemed as if by a procession of
giants had gone by finding it as the
most opportune moment the two men rushed
towards the holes where the treasure
sean brightly under the moonlight
Dario sat down holding the bags open and
Bearnaise kept drawing the treasure out
and filling them onto the bags now the
two bags were filled and the third one
was left when suddenly a low murmur like
a distant store
broke upon Dario's ears the stones had
finished drinking and were hastening
back to their places hurry up
they are coming my my ham does stuck
help me oh snap
it is too late take care of my friend my
life is precious
thank you for the riches by what No
Dario with the two banks started to run
when he suddenly tripped over and fell
the bags went flying in the air and
dropped behind a bush
just then the tallest stone ran past
Dario and stopped straight in front of
Bernays so that no other could get past
it was the stone on which Bernays had
carved the hearts meanwhile the other
stones surrounded Dario mhm you cannot
harm me I have the purple Apple this is
not apple disk reads fool and then all
the stones encircled him Dario at once
turned into dust
meanwhile the tall stone spoke to
Bernays you are a good man you deserve
to live run before my brothers come but
but my hand is stuck not anymore
and just like that Vern as his head was
not stuck anymore
he at once got up thank you so much
there is no need to thank me you gave me
a heart I am just repaying the favor now
run oh don't forget your bags of
treasures but they are not mine
Bernays hung his head low I took it from
here you are honest
tell you what now the bags are yours now
go at once rod Bernays smiled and ran
away when all the stones had finally
taken their respective places back and
settled Bernays picked the bags lined
behind the bush and went home the next
day
Bernays went to meet marcin and told him
all about what had happened
Rasen ik and marzi were shocked that
wicked witch wanted to marry my sister
well no point dwelling in the past he
got what he deserved
yes and I have also understood that only
the riches cannot buy my sister
happiness I am sorry my child it is ok
brother you did what any brother would
do and you burn as I did not know that
you and my sister were in love with each
other and to be honest I am glad I did
not because I would have never allowed
it but now now I can see past my
blindness you are a good man Bernays and
more importantly an honest one and thus
raza Nick and Bearnaise were married in
a grand ceremony marzi was very happy
for he finally found the suitable person
for his sister but guess who was happier
oh sweet talk time in broad daylight
bring on the party
